name: Easy UPI Payment
author: Noobs.Group

sections.description:
Easy UPI Payment plugin (for WooCommerce ) helps you accept payments online from your Customers instantly & directly into your bank account (without paying any Commission or Charge : 100% Free) via UPI applications (like: BHIM App, Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, Whatsapp Pay, or via any other UPI based application).

Support

For Support: Click here!

*We do not provide support here, Click above link to get support.
sections.installation: yoursiteurl/wp-admin > Plugins > Add New > Upload > Install > Activate > WooCommerce > Settings > Payments > Easy UPI Payment > Setup
sections.faq:
Is there any demo available?

Click here: Live demo
